ScriptItemPortable.SourceCode:
def Load(widget): if widget.Entity == None: return
entity = widget.Entity
if entity.EhConfirmar() == True: widget.View.Commands["New"].Visible = False widget.View.Commands["Edit"].Visible = False widget.View.Commands["Delete"].Visible = False
if entity.EhConfirmado() == True: widget.View.Commands["New"].Visible = False widget.View.Commands["Edit"].Visible = False widget.View.Commands["Delete"].Visible = False
if entity.EhVencido() == True: widget.View.Commands["New"].Visible = False widget.View.Commands["Edit"].Visible = False widget.View.Commands["Delete"].Visible = False
if entity.EhCancelado() == True: widget.View.Commands["New"].Visible = False widget.View.Commands["Edit"].Visible = False widget.View.Commands["Delete"].Visible = False
